About us

results.title: About Us | Rapidly Prototype Company Since 1999 - HONPE
results.content: Professional Equipment 485 5-axis CNC 25 Our process How we serve you 01 Communication 02 Research 03 Carried out 04
results.raw_content:
Company profiles
Established in 1999, Honpe is the prototyping pioneer with an emphasis on automotive, digital product, AI product, home appliance, medical, and low-volume plastic and metal parts production.
Honpe Technology
(Shenzhen) Co., Ltd was founded in 1999, specializing in the processing and
production of various digital product mock-up, car prototype, home appliance prototype,
medical prototype, and low-volume plastic & metal part production. At
present, the plant covers an area of 60,000+ square meters, has 485+ CNC
machining centers, 25 sets of 5-axis machining centers, 1250+ employees, and has
its own electroplating and oxidation factory, leather case production workshop,
and other complete supporting facilities for model making.
Number of employees
1250

24

485
5-axis CNC

2018-2021
2017-2018
2016-2017
2010-2015
1999-2005
2019
Honpe’s the whole car department was established, equipped with automotive professional workshops and sheet metal workshops
2020
Established a complete vehicle business department and added a number of sophisticated and complete supporting equipment
2021
HONPE independently researches and develops a one-to-one sports car from appearance design to proofing
2017
Strengthen the company's confidentiality management system and implement a two-pronged legally effective confidentiality agreement
2018
Professional processing and production of various digital product models, car models, home appliance models and metal parts, etc.
2018
The plant covers an area of 30,000 square meters, equipped with advanced processing centers and equipment
2016
Due to the continuous development of the business and the company, the two companies were merged and 30 million yuan was invested to expand production capacity again
2016
Increase investment in 50 cnc equipment to produce household appliances and car models, which are mainly used to develop and serve the Japanese, European and American markets.
2017
Annual sales: USD 10 million in 2012, USD 12 million in 2013, USD 15 million in 2014
2010
For better development needs, the company was re-registered and renamed-HONPE Jingying Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd.
2011
Invest 20 million yuan to set up a branch in Guangming New District, Shenzhen, which mainly develops home appliances and automobile business. The plant area is 4,200 square meters, the staff is 150, and the CNC equipment is 45.
2015
In order to expand business in the European, American and Japanese markets, the company is gradually moving towards international standards
1999
HONPE Model Prototype Factory was founded in Longhua, Shenzhen, invested in 3 sets of equipment milling machines, 1 set of lathes, 25 staff, mainly making home appliance models.
2003
Fully invest and expand the scale, increase 15 CNC processing centers, and increase the number of personnel to more than 70.
2005
In order to meet the needs of market competition and to pursue higher quality requirements, I began to learn to make mobile phones and various digital models.
Quality Inspection
Certified with ISO 9001:2008 and ISO 14001, we perform coordinate measuring, quadratic element measuring and other QC methods for your product quality.
High Confidentiality
High confidentiality is the No.1 rule in Honpe. Fully complying with ISO27001, our whole company ensure that your order information is not leaked.
International teams
Our professional technicians are distributed in China, the United States, Italy, Japan, Mexico and other countries to offer solutions for your product R&D.
Management Teams
Our international teams perform undergone rigorous training, committed to providing customers with the top-notch service.
Address：No. 176, Tengfeng Road, Fenghuang second industrial zone, Fuyong street, Baoan District, Shenzhen, Guangdong, China 518103

With a professional international design and R&D team, we can work with customers to complete the best plan formulation and quickly ...
results.raw_content:
Our Service
Provide one-stop product solutions from design, prototyping to production.
CNC precision machining
500+ cutting-edge 3-axis, 4-axis, 5-axis CNC machining centers includes CNC milling, CNC turning, EDM wire cutting, electric discharge machining, and other professional supporting equipment.
Sheet metal processing
Rapid sheet metal prototype & low volume production for your metal parts & whole devices, with automation laser cutting and bending machines.
3D printing
Our advanced SLS, MJF and other additive manufacturing capabilities empower Honpe to create 3D printed prototypes from both plastic and metal materials.
Vacuum Casting
Vacuum Casting (or silicone mold casting, polyurethane casting, urethane casting) provides a low-cost and quick turnaround for high-quality plastic part prototyping.
Injection Molding
Our injection molding includes single-cavity molding, multi-cavity molding and family-cavity molding for low volume production with the quantity 500-5000pcs.
Who are we
HONPE will realize people's dreams with cutting-edge innovative technology
HONPE  Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999,
Specializing in the production of various digital product models, car models, home appliance models, and the processing and production of metal parts.
With a professional international design and R&D team, we can work with customers to complete the best plan formulation and quickly complete the production of prototype models.
HONPE has branches and offices in the United States, Italy, Germany, Britain, France, and Japan, and its business covers European and American countries.

On the way home on weekend, I watched in amazement as the cars passed by on the busy Chinese streets. Some of them were local brands, while others were high-end imports. I couldn't help but notice how the side skirts (#sidespoilers) on these vehicles sunk in on the front door and then gradually recovered on the rear door. It was a good design that works well for the speed limit of 120km/h on Chinese highways.
A couple of years ago, Honpe Tech unveiled a new #carprototype that boasted an even safer design. Their model had the #sideskirts sunk in on the front door as before, but it also had a rectangular opening with an air filter installed below the rear door. It was an innovative solution to improving airflow and reducing drag while driving.
When driving on the highway, which one will be much safer in your opinion? And tell me about something you've seen a car driving on the #autobahn road in Germany.
To view or add a comment, sign in
364 followers
I said no way to read a young girl's heart, but the industrial designer from Apple made it and Honpe Tech is able to prototype it.
The cherry pink Apple 15 you will get in a couple weeks may be under production in China's Shenzhen, Zhengzhou, or India's Tamil Nadu. And the approximate output of all the series of Apple 15 may reach up to 75 million sets.
Will you book the Apple 15 series with the industrial design in cherry pink? Don't get it lost in your cozy room.

results.title: Big Chinese companies brighten 2024 CES - Chinadaily.com.cn
results.content: Chinese technology companies have made a prominent comeback at the 2024 Consumer Electronics Show (CES). At the world's premier tech show in Las Vegas in the United States, they are showcasing their latest achievements in cutting-edge technologies. These range from artificial intelligence, next-generation semiconductor display, autonomous ...
results.raw_content:
Big Chinese companies brighten 2024 CES
Chinese technology companies have made a prominent comeback at the 2024 Consumer Electronics Show (CES).
At the world's premier tech show in Las Vegas in the United States, they are showcasing their latest achievements in cutting-edge technologies. These range from artificial intelligence, next-generation semiconductor display, autonomous driving, robots to augmented reality.
Highlighting that China is playing an increasingly vital role in bolstering technological innovation, experts said intelligent devices powered by generative AI and the internet of things are expected to become a key growth driver for global consumer electronics industry.
According to the US Consumer Technology Association, which organizes the event, more than 4,000 enterprises from across the globe are participating in the CES, which opened on Tuesday and will conclude on Friday. Of these, 1,114 are from China and 1,201 are based in the US.
AI-powered terminal devices are attracting attention this year amid a worldwide frenzy over the ChatGPT chatbot. Chinese consumer electronics maker TCL demonstrated over 120 pieces of intelligent hardware covering quantum dot mini-LED TVs, AI processing chips, smartphones, intelligent AR goggles and vehicle-mounted display products.
The company is accelerating efforts to expand presence in North America by boosting production capacity at its Mexican factory, given that building global competitiveness has always been important for TCL.
Hisense Group, a major Chinese home appliance manufacturer, unveiled its latest ultra light-emitting diode or ULED TV and laser display technology at the CES.
David Gold, vice-president of Hisense International, said at a product launch event that display technology is widely applied in sports, education and medical fields, continuously pushing technological boundaries.
Lenovo Group Ltd, the world's largest personal computer maker, unveiled a full lineup of more than 40 new devices and solutions powered by AI at the CES. It said it believes this year will mark the advent of AI-based PCs.
Xpeng AeroHT, an affiliate of China's Xpeng Motors, showcased its pilotless flying car, an electric vertical takeoff and landing, or eVTOL, aircraft at the CES.
"Chinese tech companies are at the forefront of technological innovation globally, and actively promoting the application of AI in consumer electronics, intelligent devices and electric vehicles," said Hong Yong, a researcher at the Chinese Academy of International Trade and Economic Cooperation.
The latest technological breakthroughs made by Chinese companies in the fields of virtual reality and autonomous driving also reflect their strengths and innovative capabilities in crucial technologies, which will be conducive to industrial upgrades and boosting their own competitiveness on the global stage, Hong said.
Chinese augmented reality company Xreal showcased its latest AR-enabled innovative products by partnering with companies such as Qualcomm and BMW.
CES attendees can join a Las Vegas tour hosted by BMW, where they will have the opportunity to experience Xreal's AR glasses along the way. They can witness how in-car information, including navigation cues, hazard warnings, entertainment content and charging station details seamlessly integrate into the real environment through Xreal Air 2 glasses.
Jin Peng, co-founder of Xreal, said, "In the future world, whether it's in offices or entertainment, for mobile commuting or personal enjoyment, people will engage in work and experience life in new and creative ways."
Chinese tech companies have shown the potential to lead the industry not only in mature categories such as smartphones, but also in emerging fields such as artificial intelligence of things, AR and VR, said Pan Helin, co-director of the Digital Economy and Financial Innovation Research Center at Zhejiang University's International Business School.
Contact the writers at fanfeifei@chinadaily.com.cn

. All rights reserved. The content (including but not limited to text, photo, multimedia information, etc) published in this site belongs to China Daily Information Co (CDIC). Without written authorization from CDIC, such content shall not be republished or used in any form.

About us
Honpe Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999, specialize in the production of various digital product models, automotive models, household appliances models, as well as metal parts processing and manufacturing. At present, our factory covers an area of 30,000 square meters, with 300 sets CNC machines, 21 sets five-axis machining centers and over 800 employees. We have our own electroplating and oxidation workshop, leather processing workshop, polishing workshop, color matching and spray screen printing workshop, radium carving workshop, duplicate mold workshop and other model production needs of the complete set equipment.
The professional international design, research and development team can cooperate with customers to complete the optimal program formulation, rapid completion of prototype and functional mechanism.
Our company has branches and offices in the United States, Italy, Germany, the United Kingdom, France and Japan. Business covers Europe and the United States.
Honpe is also certified with ISO9001, ISO14001 and ISO27001.

On the way home on weekend, I watched in amazement as the cars passed by on the busy Chinese streets. Some of them were local brands, while others were high-end imports. I couldn't help but notice how the side skirts (#sidespoilers) on these vehicles sunk in on the front door and then gradually recovered on the rear door. It was a good design that works well for the speed limit of 120km/h on Chinese highways.
A couple of years ago, Honpe Tech unveiled a new #carprototype that boasted an even safer design. Their model had the #sideskirts sunk in on the front door as before, but it also had a rectangular opening with an air filter installed below the rear door. It was an innovative solution to improving airflow and reducing drag while driving.
When driving on the highway, which one will be much safer in your opinion? And tell me about something you've seen a car driving on the #autobahn road in Germany.
364 followers
I said no way to read a young girl's heart, but the industrial designer from Apple made it and Honpe Tech is able to prototype it.
The cherry pink Apple 15 you will get in a couple weeks may be under production in China's Shenzhen, Zhengzhou, or India's Tamil Nadu. And the approximate output of all the series of Apple 15 may reach up to 75 million sets.
Will you book the Apple 15 series with the industrial design in cherry pink? Don't get it lost in your cozy room.
#isaidnoway #apple15 #cherrypink #industrialdesign

results.content: Honpe Prototyping | 263 followers on LinkedIn. Honpe Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd-CNC machining/rapid prototyping/ 3D printing/ injection moulding/ surface finishing | Honpe Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999, specialize in the production of various digital product models, automotive models, household appliances models, as well as metal parts processing and manufacturing.
results.raw_content:
Honpe Prototyping
Industrial Machinery Manufacturing
Shenzhen , Guangdong
364 followers
About us
Honpe Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999, specialize in the production of various digital product models, automotive models, household appliances models, as well as metal parts processing and manufacturing. At present, our factory covers an area of 30,000 square meters, with 300 sets CNC machines, 21 sets five-axis machining centers and over 800 employees. We have our own electroplating and oxidation workshop, leather processing workshop, polishing workshop, color matching and spray screen printing workshop, radium carving workshop, duplicate mold workshop and other model production needs of the complete set equipment.
The professional international design, research and development team can cooperate with customers to complete the optimal program formulation, rapid completion of prototype and functional mechanism.
Our company has branches and offices in the United States, Italy, Germany, the United Kingdom, France and Japan. Business covers Europe and the United States.
Honpe is also certified with ISO9001, ISO14001 and ISO27001.
Email: business@honpe.com

results.title: ABOUT US | english - HONPE
results.content: Established in 1999 in Shenzhen (China), the Honpe Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd production site covers an area of approximately 30,000 square meters and has more than 700 employees. The predominant technology is swarf removal, in fact, there are approximately 300 CNC machines, 21 of which have 5 axes. The production site is able to carry out ...
results.raw_content:
HOME
NEWS
ABOUT US
TECHNOLOGY
SECTORS
CONTACT
More
OUR HISTORY
In 2017, with the objective of satisfying the needs of the Italian and European markets, we opened the first Italian sales subsidiary in Turin.
At Honpe Technology Srl, thanks to the cooperation with the Honpe Technology (Shenzen) Co., Ltd production site, we support our customers throughout the various development processes of their products.
Since then we have achieved important milestones, supplying prototype products, as well as limited production series, to leading companies in various sectors, helping them from the initial design stage all the way to the end product.
During this time we have always relied on our Team, which deals with technical-commercial, logistic and administrative aspects.
HONPE TEAM
With a widespread presence in the country, the Honpe team is made up of skilled resources, keen and focused on offering a prompt and high quality service.
We are at your complete disposal to examine your projects together and recommend the most suitable technological solutions.
In the production stage, our team will keep you constantly updated on the status of your orders.
Our support is constant and includes all of the assistance you will need.
PRODUCTION SITE
Established in 1999 in Shenzhen (China), the Honpe Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd production site covers an area of approximately 30,000 square meters and has more than 700 employees.
The predominant technology is swarf removal, in fact, there are approximately 300 CNC machines, 21 of which have 5 axes.
The production site is able to carry out most processes needed to supply the finished component. There are several workshops at the site that deal with surface finishing as well as structural treatment of materials.
Furthermore, you will find all the technologies required for general metalworking pieces such as electrical discharge machining, welding, metal sheet folding, laser beam machining. There is also a quality department, capable of preparing dimensional reports based on project requirements.
Honpe Technology (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd follows all guidelines adopted by its customers and the target market. In fact, the company is certified ISO 9001 for quality management, ISO 14001 for environmental management and finally ISO 27001 for information security management. The latter requirement is essential for us, especially when considering the confidentiality of the projects we handle.
CERTIFICAZIONI
IATF 16949:2016
ISO 14001
ISO 9001
ISO 27001

Milan (MI), Ital)

results.title: HONPE Prototyping
results.content: HONPE History. Honpe Technology (Shenzhen) Co., was founded in 1999, with more than 50 professional employees, specializing in household appliances prototyping in Longhua, Shenzhen. We began mobile/cellular digital mockups in 2005.
results.raw_content:
Prototyping
for challenging requirements
1999
Become a part of #HonpeMéxico ur journey.
Honpe Technology (Shenzhen) Co. was founded in 1999, with over 50 professional employees specializing in household appliance prototypes in Longhua, Shenzhen.
2011
Become a part of #HonpeMéxico ur journey.
After our business reached international markets in 2011, we established a new branch in Guangming, Shenzhen, catering to the demands of Europe and Japan.
2015
Become a part of #HonpeMéxico ur journey.
HONPE opens a subsidiary in Japan, followed by Italy in 2016, culminating in Mexico in 2020.
2020
Become a part of #HonpeMéxico ur journey.
In 2020, a second factory named San-E was established in the Quanzhou region, Fujian. It boasts a built area of 15,000 ㎡ and features 80 CNC machining centers with 3 and 5 axes.
Confidentiality
Protecting private information is a core value at Honpe.
Phones
No cell phones or cameras are allowed in the factoory.
Accessibility
Each project is handled independently and in closed areas to avoid information leaks.
Monitoring
Workshop entrances are monitored by automatic fingerprint access.
Protocols
Secure Server Protocols and Encrypted Network Connections.
Quality Management
The objective of this international standard is to ensure the quality of the products and/or services we offer at Honpe Prototyping Mexico through a quality management system (QMS).
Environmental Managment
ISO 14001 is an international standard for environmental management systems (EMS). It assists us in controlling environmental aspects, reducing impacts, and ensuring legal compliance.
Information Security
ISO 27001 aims to establish information security management policies, ensure confidentiality and integrity of data, as well as processes. It is currently the most internationally recognized standard for information security management systems (ISMS).
ERP
An ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) is a business management system that efficiently integrates and administers key processes and data within an organization. It provides a centralized platform enabling planning, monitoring, and control of various business areas and functions.
Quality Management
The objective of this international standard is to ensure the quality of the products and/or services we offer at Honpe Prototyping Mexico through a quality management system (QMS).
Environmental Management
ISO 14001 is an international standard for environmental management systems (EMS). It assists us in controlling environmental aspects, reducing impacts, and ensuring legal compliance.
Information Security
ISO 27001 aims to establish information security management policies, ensure confidentiality and integrity of data, as well as processes. It is currently the most internationally recognized standard for information security management systems (ISMS).
ERP
An ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) is a business management system that efficiently integrates and administers key processes and data within an organization. It provides a centralized platform enabling planning, monitoring, and control of various business areas and functions.
